location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Translation of a note from Aga Mahomed Esmail [Āghā Muḥammad Ismā’īl] to William Bruce

physicalDescription.extent: This is an enclosure to a letter from William Bruce to Stephen Babbington dated 23 December 1811 (see folios 96v-97).

mods.abstract: The note concerns Aga Mahomed Esmail's [Āghā Muḥammad Ismā’īl] outstanding salary. It names Aga Mahomed Quomershiha as the man's agent, who has been invested with the power of attorney, and requests that the outstanding salary (along with future monthly payments) is paid to this agent.
